hero.name: Hamidreza Daneshsarand
hero.description: With 5+ years of experience in mechanical design and manufacturing, I specialize in SolidWorks, cost optimization, and production efficiency. Available for immediate relocation to Sweden.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Professional Background & Education
about.intro: I am a passionate Mechanical Design Engineer with deep expertise in SolidWorks, cost optimization, and sustainable manufacturing. With over 5 years of professional experience at leading companies like ZF AG and SKF, I have designed 50+ components, achieved €50,000 in annual savings, and reduced maintenance costs by 30%. I specialize in transforming complex engineering challenges into efficient, cost-effective solutions.
about.description: I specialize in mechanical design using SolidWorks, focusing on cost reduction and efficiency improvements in automotive and bearing industries. My work at ZF AG Transmissions and IBC Iran (SKF) has involved designing precision components, assembly tools, and implementing Lean Manufacturing and Six Sigma methodologies.
about.description2: With a Master's degree in Manufacturing Engineering from University of Tabriz (GPA: 3.69/4.0) and expertise in CAD design, CNC programming, and statistical analysis using Python, I am passionate about innovation and eager to contribute to Sweden's advanced engineering sector.
about.swedenReason: Sweden represents the pinnacle of sustainable engineering and innovation. I am deeply drawn to the country's commitment to quality, environmental responsibility, and cutting-edge manufacturing technologies. As an engineer who values precision, sustainability, and continuous improvement, I see Sweden as the ideal environment to apply my skills and grow professionally. I am actively learning Swedish (currently A2 level) and am ready for immediate relocation to join Sweden's world-class engineering community.
about.value1Desc: Driving continuous improvement through creative engineering solutions
about.value2Desc: Working effectively with global teams to achieve common goals
about.value3Desc: Designing with environmental impact and resource efficiency in mind
about.degree1Thesis: Three-dimensional design, construction and performance of plastic panels of sandwich structures

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.subtitle: Professional Journey & Achievements
experience.description1: Leading the design of automotive transmission spare parts using SolidWorks, with a focus on cost optimization and manufacturing efficiency. Developed 50+ precision components and 15+ assembly tools and quality gauges conforming to ISO standards.
experience.achievement1: Reduced maintenance costs by 30% through innovative part redesigns
experience.achievement2: Achieved €50,000 in annual savings via cost-reduction project
experience.achievement3: Improved efficiency by 50% with dual-spindle device design
experience.description2: Designed precision tools and ISO-standard quality gauges for bearing assembly processes. Led factory layout planning and production line optimization while implementing grease optimization initiatives.
experience.achievement5: Reduced production time by 20% with custom tool designs
experience.achievement6: Optimized grease usage, saving 10 tons yearly
experience.description3: Specialized in plastic injection molding and quality control for automotive components. Conducted mold flow analysis and implemented process improvements.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Portfolio of Engineering Solutions
projects.project1Description: Comprehensive redesign of 50+ automotive transmission spare parts using SolidWorks, focusing on cost optimization and manufacturing efficiency.
projects.project2Description: Design and development of precision tools and ISO-standard quality gauges for bearing assembly processes.
projects.project3Description: Developed machine learning model using Python to predict CNC tool wear, enabling proactive maintenance and reducing downtime.
projects.project4Description: Patent-pending automated machine design for industrial shaft surface preparation, achieving 50% cycle time reduction.
projects.project5Description: Designed and validated comprehensive testing system for automotive transmissions, ensuring compliance with international standards.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's discuss opportunities in Sweden
contact.description: I am actively seeking mechanical design engineering opportunities in Sweden and am available for immediate relocation. Let's connect to discuss how I can contribute to your team.
contact.formSuccess: Message sent successfully! I'll get back to you soon.
contact.formError: Failed to send message. Please try again or email me directly.

footer.brandDescription: Mechanical Design Engineer specializing in SolidWorks, cost optimization, and sustainable manufacturing. Available for opportunities in Sweden.
footer.availability: Available for immediate relocation to Sweden
